channel.title: Cloudbase LABS
channel.description: CloudbaseLABS is a training program developed by Cloudbase Solutions in the fields of Python programming, OpenStack and DevOps technologies and practices.

item.title: Cloudbase LABS through the eyes of a former participant!
item.description: Today we want to share with you the experience of Nashwan, a Cloud Engineer at Cloudbase Solutions and a former applicant of our workshops from the LigaAC LABS project.

item.title: Cloudbase LABS interview information!
item.description: If you’re reading this it means that you’ve applied or you’re thinking of applying to our Cloudbase LABS workshops in Iași.

item.title: Cloudbase LABS applications are open!
item.description: The applications for Cloudbase LABS are now open in Iași. If you are a student, apply until January 23 for a chance to attend a two week Python and DevOps workshop held by our colleagues from the Cloudbase team.
